comments:
Eclipse pre-3.2.1 (0919 build)

To reproduce, open a *detached* properties View in the workbench, and play with a CCombo-based property in that view. Such a property can be found in GEF's Logic example editor when nothing is selected. Several interactions cause the error, including clicking on the workbenchwindow while the dropdown is open.

Reopen when youi have the steps.
